alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 6:26AM CDT until October 28 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Dallas. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will begin. The pasture lands near the river will flood. Trails along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 30.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 13.6 feet Thursday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
